titleStmt.title: Act prorogating the dyet of the ministers taking the oath of alledgeance and assurance. Edinburgh, the fifteenth day of June, 1693.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Extracted forth of the records of Parliament, by Tarbat. Cls. Registri.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
